sentence.Network_cn: 没人能够反驳他的说法。

sentence.Network_en: However much people have criticised her style and some of her policies no one will gainsay her courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论人们如何强烈地批评她的处事风格和某些政策，她的勇气却无人能够否认。

sentence.Network_en: The practical and pragmatic gainsay the Utopian and transcendental.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际的和实用的,否定了空想的和先验的东西.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... fuscous 暗褐色的；深色的 gainsay 否认 against 反对.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... frozen 冻结的；冷酷的 gainsay 反驳；否定 gainsaid 否认；反对.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... frozen 冻结的；冷酷的 gainsay 反驳；否定 gainsaid 否认；反对.

list.abs: There was no gainsaying the astronomer ' s knowledge about the planets ., 这位天文学家对于行星的知识是毋庸置疑的.
There is no gainsaying his innocence ., 他的清白不容否认.
beyond英语的... ... beyond compute 不可计算， 无法估计 beyond gainsay 无可否认, 不容置疑 beyond retrieval 不能补救[挽回]的.
And those who dared to gainsay the wisdom of the fathers were shunned allpeople ., 谁去否认祖先的智慧 , 谁就会遭到正人君子的冷落.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from obsolete gain- 'against' + say

entry.def: If there is no gainsaying something, it is true or obvious and everyone would agree with it.

example.ex: However much people have criticised her style and some of her policies no one will gainsay her courage...
example.tran: 无论人们如何强烈地批评她的处事风格和某些政策，她的勇气却无人能够否认。

example.ex: There is no gainsaying the fact that they have been responsible for a truly great building.
example.tran: 不容否认的事实是，他们一手建起了一座真正伟大的建筑。

auth_sentence.content: No one, including a liberal, can gainsay that.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one, including a liberal, can gainsay that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one, including a liberal, can gainsay that.

auth_sentence.content: We won't quibble with the thought, nor gainsay the sincerity with which it was offered.
auth_sentence.res_content: We won't quibble with the thought, nor gainsay the sincerity with which it was offered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We won't quibble with the thought, nor gainsay the sincerity with which it was offered.

sentences.en: There is no gainsaying his honesty.
sentences.cn: 他的诚实是不可否认的。
无可否认, 不容置疑
